question: Which of the following kings succeeded the king Koccadiyan Ranadhira?
explanation: Maravarman Rajasimha I was a Pandya king of early medieval South India. He was the son and successor of Koccadiyan Ranadhira and ruled the Pandya empire from 730 A.D. to 765 A.D. He is remembered for his important successes against the Pallavas and in the Kongu country.
